akn:content.akn:p: §§ 3861, 3862. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Appropriations for this subchapter have not been authorized for fiscal years after 1975. Section 3861, Pub. L. 90–445, title II, § 201, as added Pub. L. 92–381, § 1, Aug. 14, 1972, 86 Stat. 534, related to project grants and contracts for the training of personnel in fields related to diagnosis and treatment of delinquent youths and parental counseling or instruction. A prior section 3861, Pub. L. 90–445, title II, § 201, July 31, 1968, 82 Stat. 470, related to similar subject matter, prior to the general amendment of Pub. L. 90–445 by section 1 of Pub. L. 92–381. Section 3862, Pub. L. 90–445, title II, § 202, as added Pub. L. 92–381, § 1 Aug. 14, 1972, 86 Stat. 535, related to recipients and conditions of grants and contracts. A prior section 3862, Pub. L. 90–445, title II, § 202, July 31, 1968, 82 Stat. 470, related to similar subject matter, prior to the general amendment of Pub. L. 90–445 by section 1 of Pub. L. 92–381.
